Text: It took me over 3 days to fine tune this project into what I'm now sharing with you all. A pat on the back is all I'm looking for.  Really.   Good Job, dude.  I might even be motivated to do the same thing to fountainhead and the others.
and it does all fit on one cd., btw

Unabridged, 1991, Blackstone Audio Books
Reader is Christopher Hurt 24Kbps

Nice idea and very generous. 
It seems you are using BitComet to create your torrents. Have a search for BitComet padding files.
Thanks for your efforts and upload, krhea63.

I was happy to find a light torrent for this audiobook, and I appreciate the effort of the chapters, but unfortunately the sound is pretty poor. Maybe it's because it is 24 kbps bitrate (?).
Thanks anyway.
